name: Pear & Cranberry Fizz
preparation:
In a shaker, muddle the lemon juice and cranberries.
Add the remaining ingredients except the club soda and fill with ice.
Shake vigorously for 20 seconds and pour (unstrained) into a highball glass.
Add additional ice to fill the glass if needed and top with club soda.
Garnish with pear slices and fresh cranberries.
